key_risks: Market concentration in New Jersey exposes the company to regional economic fluctuations
Intense competition from larger national banks and fintech companies
Regulatory changes could increase compliance costs and operational complexity
Significant cybersecurity threats and potential data breaches
social_issues: Maintaining customer trust in private banking and wealth management services
governance_issues: Regulatory oversight and compliance with federal and state banking regulations
